name: Bread in the Sky
description:
You must constantly eat bread by clicking on it or owls to fly to it. Don't touch the owls. Your hunger must not reach 0.  If you start then immediately die that is because you spawned on top of an owl just restart and it will randomly spawn again. The game is not optimized, and loading times are a bit long. I'm not that good with UI, sorry. First time doing a game jam.

owl art from: Epic owl | Pixel Art Maker

cloud background: Clouds pixel art | Pixel Art Maker
